form.p: This template may be used to create a JaxRS Remote Service Consumer project.
During project creation with this template, the apipackage/plugin containing the HelloWorldService class declaration must
be provided so that the compile-time references to HelloWorldService can be resolved. The apipackage/plugin name given
should already exist in the workspace, and may be easily created by using the JaxRS Remote Service API project template. Upon
creation, the project will have a class with an HelloWorldService interface injected via DS. Upon activation, the injected
